#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        ll f[26]={0},ans=0;
        cin>>s;
        ll i=0;
        while(s[i]!='\0')
        f[s[i]-'a']++,i++;
        for( i=0;i<26;i++)
            ans+=((i+1)*f[i]);
            cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
